alert.note: Alert for Camden; Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Somerset; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:44PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ocean, southeastern Hunterdon, central Camden, Mercer, Burlington, southern Somerset, southwestern Monmouth, central Middlesex and southeastern Bucks Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 944 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sergeantsville to Beverly to near Sicklerville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trenton, New Brunswick, Somerset, Old Bridge, Bensalem, Jackson, East Brunswick, Evesham, South Brunswick, Mount Laurel, North Brunswick, Manalapan, Ewing, Willingboro, Voorhees, Medford, Lindenwold, Lumberton, Princeton and Florence. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 4 and 10. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 351 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 34 and 40. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 36 and 76. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 4 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Somerset; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth
